karen tricked jim into believing she dated most of the guys at david wallace's cocktail party, including david wallace. she told jim he was her first, also a lie .
dwight tricked holly into believing that kevin was mentally challenged. it backfired on holly when she tried to defend kevin from angela by using the information dwight gave her.

darryl tricked andy into thinking sabre was covering up that their printers were a possible fire hazard. . this backfired when they filmed a printer catching fire, proving andy right. an unsettled daryl decided to quit pranking for good .

pam, with kevin's help, rearranged the elevator buttons to prank dwight, to make up for accidentally ruining jim's key prank . this backfired when they both became stuck in the elevator and dwight  began urinating in the corner .
dwight placed a live porcupine in his own desk drawer, in an attempt to frame jim. this backfired when jim tricked dwight into revealing the porcupine's name .
dwight defaced his own car, writing "jim is awesome" in an attempt to frame jim and get his christmas bonus . this backfired as andy had decided not to withhold anyone's bonus .
dwight put a jack-o'-lantern over his head and scared erin. this backfired when he was unable to remove it afterwards . ​​​
dwight tricks michael into eating a bull testicle after not recommending dwight to replace michael. .
when jim is faced with a litany of various pranks he has pulled on dwight he says they don't sound that funny one after another, but insists that dwight deserves it .
jim comments about how when he saw dwight again after being away at stamford for awhile, he realized that all the pranks he pulled were petty and stupid...until dwight spoke .
